name: com.unity.asset-store-validation
description: Asset Store Validation Suite is a validation package designed to validate that UPM packages meet all necessary requirements to be uploaded to the Asset Store.

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed

- Mechanism used to detect if the user is currently logged in
- Validation report not showing when the package has not been published before
- Error in console when running validation on 2021 on a package with empty scene
